bike.description: All-new sport comfort design, hi-tensile steel with low-standover/upright ride position, internal cable routing, center-mount kickstand bracket
bike.paint_description: M: Ano Black or TigerJAMIS_SINGLEQUOTEs Eye   S/T: Ocean Mist or TigerJAMIS_SINGLEQUOTEs Eye

components.description: Coil-spring suspension, alloy crown,chrome-plated stanchions, mini boots, 60mm travel
Alex C-1000 alloy rims, 36H, with Formula alloy hubs, QR front and rear, 14g stainless steel spokes
SRAM X rear, Shimano M191 31.8mm top swing/dual pull front
SR XCC alloy crank with 48/38/28 chainrings, 170mm crank length, with chainguard
VP sealed bolt type, 3RB axle, 68 x 129mm (35-52-42)
Comfort platform with TPE non-slip insert
ProMax alloy direct pull brakes with Tektro Tenera levers
Hi-rise comfort, 15D sweep x 80mm rise x 640mm wide
Jamis alloy, angle-adjustable, 90mm ext x 150mm quill (13.5–17.5") or 110mm ext x 180mm quill (18–21")
Suspension, alloy micro-adjust, 350mm x 25.4mm, with alloy QR clamp
Jamis Comfort with extra thick padding, synthetic suede top, burnished side panels and bumper springs
